_header: Saint Anastasia was born in Rome
Subjects: Anastasia, saint, life of; saints’ lives
_description: Life of St. Anastasia, version in short lines

BLHar4196.First Lines: Saint Anastase was born in rome& of þe best kynred scho come…
BLHar4196.Last Lines: …hir sawl was hent to heuyn for aygod wis us forto wend þat way
BLHar4196.Editions:
Horstmann,  Carl. 
             Altenglische Legenden: Neue Folge.
         Heilbronn: Henninger, 1881: 25-8.
